name: Sentry Mead Hotel
description: Situated in Totland Bay on the Isle of Wight, this award-winning, fully licensed, property offers free Wi-Fi in all areas and benefits from free private parking on site.

name: The Forresters Arm Kilburn
description: Located in Kilburn, The Forresters Arms Kilburn features a bar and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi.

name: The Mendipp Inn
description: Situated in Binegar, The Mendip Inn has a restaurant, bar, shared lounge, and free WiFi. At the inn, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

name: The Fountain Oldwood
description: Situated in Tenbury, The Fountain Oldwood has a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground.

name: The Flower Pot Hotel
description: At the end of a charming High Street in Lower Sunbury, Surrey, this pub offers real ales, large TV screens, live music in an elegant setting. and free Wi-Fi throughout the building .

name: New Flying Horse Inn
description: Set in a 17th-century posting house featuring oak beams and gleaming brasses, New Flying Horse Inn boasts an on-site bar and restaurant, as well as a garden with a children's playground.

name: Cockets Hotel Restaurant
description: Located in Hawes, Cocketts Hotel & Restaurant features a restaurant, bar, terrace, and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms.

name: The Ashbourne Hotel
description: Set within the tranquil Lincolnshire village of North Killingholme, The Ashbourne Hotel offers modern, elegant rooms with whirlpool baths in the luxury rooms.
